rules: Rule1: Either the state has declared an emergency, or if funding does not exist, then Disease X affects the population.
Rule2: Provided that the state has lifted the emergency, the state has not declared an emergency.
Rule3: Whenever containment has failed, containment is not controlled.
Rule4: Under the condition that Protocol Alpha is executing, Protocol Alpha has been activated.
Rule5: International aid has been requested, or the agency has not established a base camp.
Rule6: If international aid has been received, then international aid has been rejected.
Rule7: Should international aid be received, international aid is accepted.
Rule8: Either international aid has been received, or international aid has not been requested.
Rule9: Given that an outbreak of Disease X occurs in the valley, the river is contaminated in the valley.
Rule10: Whenever international aid is accepted, international aid is not rejected.
Rule11: If Disease X affects the population, an outbreak of Disease X occurs in the valley.
Rule12: Provided that Disease X is spreading, Disease X is not contained.
Rule13: Either the valley has been evacuated, or if it is not the case that the absence of funding implies Disease X affects the population, then Disease X is spreading.
Rule14: Under the condition that the agency has deployed resources, the agency is monitoring the valley.
Rule15: The agency has deployed resources, or funding exists.
Rule16: If the agency has established a base camp, then the base camp is operating.
Rule17: The agency has established a base camp, or the agency is not monitoring the valley.
Rule18: In the event that it is not the case that the agency deploying resources implies the situation is stabilized, containment is controlled.

Rule19: Under the condition that the negation of the implication that the agency deployed resources leads to the situation being stabilized does not imply containment has failed, Protocol Alpha is executing.
Rule20: If it is not the case that the absence of funding implies Disease X affects the population, then Disease X is contained.
facts: Fact1: The state has lifted the emergency.
Fact2: It is not the case that the river is contaminated in the valley.
Fact3: The base camp is not operating.
Fact4: The situation is not stabilized.
Fact5: Protocol Alpha has not been activated.
Fact6: The valley has not been evacuated.
